channel.title: Exp Point per Level
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Exp Point per Level"

item.title: Exp Points per Level Chart
item.content:encoded:
If we don't already, we should have a chart of how much exp it requires to gain a level.
It would be like this:

Level 1 X exp needed to get to 2
Level 2 Y exp needed to get to 3

Etc. It could help calculate how long it would take to loop, and could be used for various other things as well.
